mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resources (postId, boardId, memberId, title, body, pdf, pptx, hwp, word, xlsx, zip, image, docx, regDate, updateDate) VALUES (#{postId}, #{boardId}, #{memberId}, #{title}, #{body}, #{pdf}, #{pptx}, #{hwp}, #{word}, #{xlsx}, #{zip}, #{image}, #{docx}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE resources SET updateDate = NOW(), pdf = #{pdf}, pptx = #{pptx}, hwp = #{hwp}, word = #{word}, xlsx = #{xlsx}, zip = #{zip}, image = #{image}, docx = #{docx} WHERE postId = #{postId}
